step.sql: SELECT P.* FROM AU_TASK_INFO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_FIELDTASK t WHERE p.imp_task_id = t.id AND T.BATCH_ID [batch])
SELECT P.* FROM AU_DATA_STATISTICS P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_FIELDTASK t WHERE p.TASK_ID = t.id AND T.BATCH_ID [batch])
SELECT P.* FROM AU_LOG_STATISTICS P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_FIELDTASK t WHERE p.TASK_ID = t.id AND T.BATCH_ID [batch])
